body:
`__radd__` won't fix this at all. We never want to allow doing `0 + Dataset`, that makes no sense. `sum` takes an optional argument which is the initial value of the reduction. You can make that the first subset of your list.

Also, in your example you could just do `dataset.get_subset('train') + dataset.get_subset('val')`, which is not this bad
